data.title: Dizzy Gillespie Discography
data.meta_description: Dizzy Gillespie [John Birks Gillespie] (born October 21, 1917, Cheraw, SC; died January 6, 1993, Englewood, NJ; aged 75), trumpet, vocal, composer, leader.
